experinces.title: System Engineer
experinces.description: Here I worked as Full stack developer for various clients namely Thomson Reuters, Cisco and Wabtec. Well verse with Java Spring, Node, React, Pl/sql, sql, nosql, Python and AWS cloud technologies like LAMBDA, EC2, EKS, API gateway, Cloudwatch, DocumentDb,Postgres, IAM etc.

experinces.title: Software Engineer - Trainee ( Intern and Fulltime)
experinces.description: Worked as a .Net full stack developer, Created CRUD APIs for various backend operations and deployed custom trained Machine learning model to detect early stage Cancer in scaned Images ( MRI, CT) using AWS microservices.
